reviewText: enjoyed watching the video. everything i expected and more. recommended to some of my friends who are interested in nose art. exceeded my expectations

Well done documentary. Great interviews with some of our heroes of the Army Air Force. Fascinating stories behind the history and meaning of aircraft nose art. Special thanks to the original artist who painted these classics.

This DVD is a must have if you love WW 2 aviation. The quility of the filming is excellant and to see the nose art and here the artist explain what the pilots thoughts were that evolved onto their planes specific art is thought provoking.

Well researched and written story of the use of nose art in the European Theatre of Operations. Much video of actual nose art and interviews with surviving veterans.  And a nice showing of nose art that survived the smelter and can be viewed in a museum.

Highly recommend to scholars and students alike.
This was a wonderful disc depicting the various  pictures on WW II aircraft. Well done and informative. Some new material I have never seen before. Excellent for Aviation buffs.
